pageContext.claim: “We need to be smart, vigilant and tough. We need the courts to give us back our rights. We need the Travel Ban as an extra level of safety!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted this in response to the deadly attacks on June 3 on the London Bridge and Borough Market. But this tweet is misleading. The U.K. is not among the six countries identified in his "travel ban," or the immigration executive order.
